testcase.name: To Test Login With Different Data
testcase.system-out: Given We should be in the Home Page.........................................passed When Enter the valid name "Admin"...........................................passed And Enter valid password "admin123".........................................passed And Click on Login validButton..............................................passed Then I should see the userName as "Welcome Paul"............................passed

testcase.name: To Test Login With Different Data 2
testcase.system-out: Given We should be in the Home Page.........................................passed When Enter the valid name "Admin"...........................................passed And Enter valid password "admin123".........................................passed And Click on Login validButton..............................................passed Then I should see the userName as "Welcome Paul"............................passed

testcase.name: To Test Login With Invalid Scenario
testcase.system-out: Given We should be in the Home Page.........................................passed When Enter the invalid Name "sunil".........................................passed And Enter invalid password "sunil"..........................................passed And Click on Login invalidButton............................................passed Then I should see the invalid credential as "Invalid credentials"...........passed
